ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Finally.
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks!  I got to smell plenty of flowers.  Too bad so many of them were on my many graves!  Actually, part of the problem I had leveling was that I love
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks! I got to smell plenty of flowers. Too bad so many of them were
on my many graves! Actually, part of the problem I had leveling was that
I love running around really fast, and have spent far too many nights
doing little else but traveling and enjoying the sights. Especially once
I got those darned MM drums! :)

Kenross Cantoforjado, 50 songs, Innoruuk


RKR wrote:
>
> Congratulations Kenross. It is a long, hard road, so well done! I hope you smelled
> plenty of flowers along the way =).
>
> Maravana Vireo
> 51 Bard of Jus Divinum
> Mithaniel Marr
